name: Room Escape - The Lost Key 9
description:
Welcome to Room Escape - The Lost Key 9, a cool escape game!

Do you think you have the skills with Room Escape - The Lost Key 9?

Room Escape 9 is another point and click escape game developed by BAMVD.Room Escape 9 games is one of the most playable game in BAMVD adventure escape games category, you need to unlock the door by finding the key inside the room with clues and solving puzzles. Your ultimate goal is to come out of the trapped room.Have a Fun!

Good luck and have fun!


Game features:

• Genuine story!
• Innovative puzzles!
• Stunning graphics!
• Realistic atmosphere!
• Tricky and challenging puzzles!
• Gorgeous graphics !
• No signup's required, just download and install!
